reporting-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

title.narrative: ICRC operations by the Niger Delegation(2020 Unaudited)

description.narrative: In Niger, the ICRC helps people affected by conflict in the south-east or fleeing fighting in north-east Nigeria. With the Niger Red Cross, we deliver aid, treat the wounded, provide water and support farmers. We monitor IHL compliance, protect detainees and help them maintain contact with their families.

participating-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

organisation.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)

mailing-address.narrative: 19 Avenue de la paix, 1202 Geneva, Switzerland
